title: Dobra Tea
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Indian, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Thai, Asian, Bakery, Fusion
description: A 100% organic/gluten free/vegan/vegetarian tea house with several locations. Over 100+ organic loose leaf teas served traditionally. Also offers matcha tea drinks, turmeric milk, authentic chai. Desserts, cakes, cookies, chia pudding, raw cookies, raw cheesecakes, raw chocolates and meals, including a macrobiotic bowl, Ayurvedic spring rolls, fresh salads, daily soup and more.
